data.title: Code of the Sea
data.meta_description: DVD-R: Code of the Sea (1924) Victor Fleming directs Rod La Rocque, Jacqueline Logan and George Fawcett
data.text:
(1924)

Director: Victor Fleming

Cast

Rod La Rocque ... Bruce McDow

Jacqueline Logan ... Jenny Hayden

George Fawcett ... Captain Hayden

Maurice 'Lefty' Flynn ... Ewart Radcliff

Luke Cosgrave ... Captain Jonas

Lillian Leighton ... Mrs. McDow

Sam Appel ... John Swayne

Young officer Bruce McDow, burdened by his late father's cowardice and haunted by his own doubts, loses his posting on The Chink. McDow is reviled for the derelictions of his father and his own hesitations, but young Jenny Hayden refuses to let him give in to despair and promises a plan that will allow him to overcome his self doubt.

63 minutes with a music score by David Knudtson
